duties_responsibilities.duty: Inspect the community and ensure all common areas and amenities are neat and free of litter at all times.
Complete assigned minor and routine service requests and assist in the turn process.
Ensure gates to all pool areas are working according to codes and safety standards.
Distribute notices and communications to residents as necessary.
Inform appropriate supervisors of any observed hazard or potentially dangerous situation for residents and others.
Demonstrate customer service skills by treating residents and others with respect and responding sensitively to complaints.
Comply with safety and risk-management policies and report accidents and incidents promptly and accurately.

education_certification.credential: Valid driver’s license to operate a golf cart on property
